RTCIceCandidatePairStats.summary: The RTCIceCandidatePairStats dictionary of the WebRTC API is used to report statistics that provide insight into the quality and performance of an while connected and configured as described by the specified pair of {{Glossary("ICE")}} candidates.

remarks.para: The statistics can be obtained by iterating the returned by until you find an entry with the type of "candidate-pair".
